title: Kirsten Dunst cuddles up to Garrett Hedlund on Golden Globes red carpet
title_page: Kirsten Dunst cuddles up to Garrett Hedlund on Golden Globes red carpet | Daily Mail Online
text:
Kirsten Dunst walked the red carpet at the Golden Globes with longtime boyfriend Garrett Hedlund proving their four-year romance is still going strong.
The 33-year-old looked stunning as she went bra-less in a cleavage-revealing Valentino frock, which featured ties across her chest.
And so it's no wonder that fellow actor Hedlund, 31, held on tight to his main squeeze.
Scroll down for video
A strong romance: Kirsten Dunst and Garrett Hedlund have been together for four years
The pair have been together since meeting on the set of the movie On The Road, released in 2012.
The relationship is clearly a strong one with Dunst saying recently that she hopes to start a family in the not to distant future.
'I want to continue acting, but I also want to have kids,' she said in a November interview with Net-A-Porter. 'I think I’ll be ready to have them in two years or something.'
See more of the latest red carpet pictures and videos from the 2016 Golden Globes
Glamorous: Dunst, 33, wowed in a low-cut black velvet Valentino gown at the Golden Globe Awards on Sunday
Secret to their romance: Dunst revealed recently that she 'appreciates old-fashioned manners' like a guy holding the door open for her and paying for dinner. 'I love the masculine,' she said
While the actress has enjoyed some pretty high-profile romances in the past, she's kept her current one on the down-low.
Away from the cameras, the two enjoy a pretty normal life, she told Net-A-Porter, bringing Hedlund along to Sunday dinners with her mom and letting him 'drag' her to action-packed blockbuster movies.
'I love the masculine; I’ve dated men who had more of a feminine side and it didn’t work,' Dunst explained.
'I appreciate old-fashioned manners. I want a guy to pay for dinner and open the door for me,' she said.
Worked together: The Spider-Man star and the Tron: Legacy actor started dating after meeting on the set of the film On The Road, released in 2012
Give and take: Dunst takes Hedlund, 31, to Sunday dinners with her mom while he 'drags' her along to see blockbuster action films
Hedlund, 31, got his big break after being cast in 2004's Troy opposite Brad Pitt.
He went on to have roles in Friday Night Lights, Tron: Legacy, Unbroken and Pan.
Dunst has been working since the age of six with a long list of credits including Interview With The Vampire, The Virgin Suicides, Bring It On and Sam Raimi's Spider-Man trilogy with Tobey Maguire.
See our full Golden Globes coverage on the winners and red carpet moments
Enchanting: The 33-year-old paired the cleavage-baring floor-length gown, cinched at her waist, with dark eye makeup and styled her blonde locks in a classy up-do
Stunner: The actress sported black eye shadow and kohl lined lids and a large pair of diamond earrings
Dunst was nominated for best performance by an actress in a limited series for her role in Fargo - but missed out to Lady Gaga.
The blonde beauty was previously nominated for a Golden Globe in 1995 for her performance in Intervew With The Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles.
She's previously been linked romantically with Jake Gyllenhaal, Adam Brody, Ben Foster and Justin Long.
Dazzling: The Melancholia actress was the picture of happiness on the red carpet
Looking to the future: Dunst recently said she would like to have children in a couple of years or so
